item.title: Bucket List - the bucket that wouldn't die
item.description: When the time comes to delete an old S3 bucket, it’s important to know that they can’t be deleted while they contain content. Here’s what you can do about it from the CLI…

item.title: TIL - shell environment variables aren't available to OS X apps
item.description: Just recently I have been exploring a very strange issue: My application couldn’t find a tool that was right where it should be…
